storyInfo: Skadi and Specter take the Doctor around the city. Consul Clementia meets with Gladiia in private. Irene encounters the Sea Patrol and assists with the investigation of a missing data scientist.

attributes.content: Did you think we were touring a museum? You were looking at the instruments like they were exhibits.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.options: The third place I mistook for a museum, then.
Why is gravity reversed in there?;What's with the water flowing around the pillars?;What's that space that warped my fingers?

attributes.content: There are some things even I can't explain.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Technology has advanced a lot in five years.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.options: There's a launchpad at the heart of the city?

attributes.content: Good eye, Doctor, that's a beacon launcher. One with plenty of history.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You know about it, Shark?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: My parents took me around the home territories when I was little. There are similar structures in many cities.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.options: I thought Ægir children were raised collectively.

attributes.content: I was, but Shark has a special relationship with her biological parents.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: They're more like friends than parents.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: They reached a consensus with the Institute of Incubation to bring me along whenever they worked on a new dome project.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I spent most my time in the Institute of Incubation, but I was able to see the cities, learn, and even work alongside them.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.options: So, what's this beacon launcher for?

attributes.content: Exactly what it sounds like: it launches beacons to mark the Waterway.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.options: Those are some huge beacons.;How big is this Waterway anyway?

attributes.content: Ægir had almost mastered the oceans around 300 years ago, efficiently using natural energy in its various forms and recording every seafloor trench in our navigational charts.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Then we cast our sights on another ocean, one brimming with stars.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Our fleets and even our cities were meant to cross that boundary that should never have existed, and light the fires of civilization beyond the barrier.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The Preserver was right, Doctor. Kristen's achievement is not beyond Ægir's reach.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The sea and the sky are closer than we thought.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: People back then tried plenty of things: surveying and deciphering the electron clouds, developing new technologies and materials, exploring forms of life that can adapt to space...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: This beacon launcher is a product of that era.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It was intended to capture even the faintest signals from the stars, and plant beacons that would never fade from our star charts.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Nanomachine swarms would form networks between the beacons, allowing us to traverse vast distances in an instant... or so we dreamed.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You never told me any of this before.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Lucid moments were hard to come by on land.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: But yesterday, I dreamt once again of walking from the Sophontheatrum straight into that epoch.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Then, I saw Laurentina dance.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: She leaped from the waves to the stars, stirring up star dust that trailed the hems of her dress. From afar, the voice of the Master of All Creation answered her in song.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The universe and imagination know no bounds, and Laurentina's dances will never cease.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Specter closes her eyes, as though sinking back into the dream.
Mm...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Just trying to picture it.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.options: It's a beautiful dream, Laurentina.;Perhaps that day will really come, Laurentina.

attributes.content: Before pushing open the door to the stars, they wanted to prepare themselves for any threats beyond the barrier... That is, until the Seaborn appeared and interrupted the dream.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: We poured all our efforts into studying them, setting aside all else: art, science, and previous visions for the future...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The Seaborn fundamentally changed Ægir.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.options: What did you do before becoming a Hunter, Skadi?;What did you do before becoming a Hunter, Specter?

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I was the best technician at the Institute of Facility Management. I could keep an entire city's underwater lighting array running on my own.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: The Institute of Development Planning's career proposal was pretty much what I was thinking, so I accepted.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Working by yourself can be lonely, but it's not such a bad thing playing with the giant fins in the reefs, or lighting up the ocean while daydreaming.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I was just an apprentice sculptor.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The Institute of Development Planning provides tailored career proposals for each citizen, which are usually in line with our wishes.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I suppose I would have gone into dome design, sculpting, or dance.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Say, Kal'tsit and Doctor, we've shared a lot of info during our time together, but we've never talked about our old lives.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I guess you're right. Sorry for bringing up something so heavy on a tour.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: We have all the waves in the world hanging above our heads. Would you care to share a dance before dealing with all this bother, Doctor?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Gladiia.
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: Gladiia's hand instinctively goes to her weapon as the woman approaches with a ceremonial sword in hand.
But all she does is put her arms around Gladiia's shoulders. Gladiia smells stimulants in the air.
Ægir do not make a habit of greeting each other with physical contact. She could not remember even her mother ever doing so.
But this woman's action felt completely natural.
Consul Clementia?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I was not aware that this was the standard salute between Chief Designers of Warfare.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Nothing makes me happier than seeing the Hunters return as lucid as ever.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Your soldiers' reactions when they first saw me suggested otherwise.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The operation to eliminate the Firstborn cost Ægir all of its Abyssal Hunters.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Secunda made many rescue attempts, but was unable to penetrate the rampaging mass of Seaborn that guard the region after the death of the Firstborn.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Your mother, Horatia, had no choice but to publicly declare you dead.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: But I know her. She doesn't really believe that.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Or perhaps Consul Horatia, foremost of the Institute of Scientific Development Planning, simply could not accept that I had died for nothing.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I know her, too.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: But I don't think it is appropriate for a meeting between two Chief Designers of Warfare to revolve around a complicated mother-daughter relationship.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Of course, of course.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Look at the city.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: The Consul's Pensivarium sits high in the city. The seawater hangs just above their heads.
The transparent dome serves as a gentle mirror, warding off the deep and foreboding void while granting the Ægir the solace of introspection.
Beneath the dome, the entire city is bathed in a blue hue. The beacon launchpad stands tall at its center, while ships glide in and out of the distant docks like schools of fins.
The sea itself has no color, only darkness. Milliarium stands in its murky depths like the vigilant eye of civilization, solitary and luminous.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: We once had many such cities. One by one, the stars in the sea went out, becoming sustenance for the Seaborn.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: All that's left on the seafloor are their colorful, eerie nests.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: I won't deny that the Abyssal Hunter project was a failed gambit. The death of the Firstborn did not stop their evolution.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: So I want to know what solution Ægir has come up with next. What you have come up with.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: What is this Waterway Program?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Gladiia, I didn't mean...
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: I'm simply part of an even bigger gambit, one with even higher stakes.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: The weapon classification scheme remains nothing more than a strict control over weapon usage to delay the evolution of the Seaborn.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: This time, however, we have taken into account every weapon at our disposal or under development.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: A mix of conventional ballistics and Class I weapons initially proved highly effective. The Seaborn were unable to comprehend why they were being burned by the seawater around them.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: But it took them only a year to adapt. 11 months in, we accelerated the adoption of Class II weapons, which operated on completely different principles.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Et cetera, et cetera.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Until their evolution outpaced the ability of the Academy of Technology to innovate.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Yes. At day's end, all we're doing is merely buying time. Ægir has committed vast resources to study the Seaborn. To eradicate them at their origin, we must first comprehend them at their source.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: The information you've brought back is highly valuable, and Breogan's discovery on land corroborates the Academy of Science's research.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: The Seaborn and the Feranmuts share the same genesis.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Is Ægir coming ashore to seek memories even more ancient?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Not just that. The Seaborn share a common genesis with the Feranmuts, but much about them is very different. Unnatural, one might say.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Their recent activity demonstrates a clear sense of purpose. They have quickly abandoned their reliance on the sea and begun to migrate towards land en masse.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Left unchecked, it is not out of the question that all of Terra could become infested with Seaborn.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: We already saw hints of that in Iberia.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Thus, for Ægir, the land is both a source of answers and a solemn responsibility.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Horatia has issued new war orders on behalf of the Institute of Development Planning, and Milliarium has come bearing new Class IV weapons from the Academy of Technology.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: They are a form of biological weapon, very different from all previous ones. Designed to induce death in nearby Seaborn nests and newborns, while driving away adults from the area.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: We have successfully located most of the nests in the target region. The ones near Iberia are the only ones yet unmarked.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Once the beacons have been placed and the weapons activated, we will finally have cleared an entire region of Seaborn, and established a route back to Ægir's home territories.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Consul Horatia would not have permitted the possibility of failure. Yet all I see is a city under siege, teetering on the brink.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Yes, she did tell me herself that 'the Waterway Program will not fail.'
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: I do not know how many other possibilities she considered, and I hope I never do. For me, this city has always been the entirety of the Waterway Program.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: But that is no longer true. The changes in the past month necessitate a review of our plans.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: The Seaborn have rapidly adapted to our new weapons, even evolving measures to protect their kindred from Class III.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: But a successful extermination operation should have left no opportunity for them to communicate with other individuals. They seem to have obtained their inspiration elsewhere.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Almost every mutation of the Seaborn against humanity has been abetted by the twisted efforts of corrupted Ægir.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Yet, the Seaborn lack true intelligence. We could toss all our prototype weapons into their nest, and they wouldn't dismantle or study them.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The Church of the Deep may be able to train them to attack an army or a city, but bringing about rapid biological changes is another matter entirely.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Unless they're not being influenced by the Church of the Deep, but by another Firstborn.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: I see you've read my belated report.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Indeed. Ulpianus claims that the one we eliminated was not the only one.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The Abyssal Hunters were the first and last Ægir to enter the Firstborn's lair.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Even now, the Seaborn defend the ruins with a frenzied fury. We have not found a way to get through.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Amongst the Hunters, Ulpianus spent the longest time there, enough for him to witness the 'truth.'
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: You're still deliberating on whether to believe him.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Yes. It could be the key to solving the mystery of the Seaborn. Or the path that leads us to destruction.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Could a Hunter survive for months on Seaborn remains and remain lucid? Would a lucid hunter willingly stay with them, rather than returning to civilization?
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: There are too many unanswered questions about Ulpianus and that fateful operation.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: And so, I regret to inform you that Ægir has no choice but to welcome its Hunters home with a tribunal.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: I thought we had designated this area for investigation.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Madam Irene? From Iberia?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: May I ask to whom I am speaking?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Secunda, Praefecta of the Sea Patrol. I regret not being able to greet you personally upon your arrival yesterday.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: The Sea Patrol is currently investigating the disappearance of a citizen. We have not requested assistance from Iberia, and respectfully request that you exit this area as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I would like to assist as myself, not as an envoy.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Your offer is appreciated, but unnecessary.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I want to—
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Any news from the other teams?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: One moment, getting the video feed now.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: Ma'am—
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: No unusual movements at the port.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: Tsk.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Alert the other teams to monitor the closed civilian gates and keep a close watch on the circulation system around town.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: You're okay with talking about this in front of me?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: This is part of our regular duties. There's no need for confidentiality.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: But you had your Little Handies clear the place out.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Only to prevent unnecessary harm to civilians.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: If you insist on staying, you'll be responsible for your own safety.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I'll—
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: The missing civilian is Tullia, a scientist from the Waterway Program, responsible for recording and calibrating data on Seaborn nests.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: She went AWOL 30 hours ago and hasn't been seen since.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Could it be... the Church of the Deep?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: That's what we intend to find out.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Her disappearance has not affected the overall progress of the project. As important as recording and calibrating the nest data is, her role was by no means irreplaceable.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: If the Church's goal was to assassinate someone to disrupt our plans, they would not have picked an ordinary data scientist.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Unless—
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: She learned something she wasn't supposed to.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I need to inspect her home.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: You're sharp, Madam Irene, but I would recommend against coming with us.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I'm simply investigating our common enemy in my own way.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: ...Suit yourself.
attributes.name: Secunda
